verbose_text: XREF_BIBR Of note, SREBP-1 is stimulated by insulin; thus, the inhibition of SREBP-1 by n-3 LC-PUFAs is of particular importance in patients with NAFLD, as they are often also affected by hyperinsulinemia and insulin resistance and are thus predisposed to insulin induced stimulation of SREBP-1 and, consequently, the synthesis and accumulation of liver fatty acids.
